Posey Tube.address: Posey and Webester Street , Alameda , CA 94502
reviewComments: This is the northern route from Alameda to Oakland. Not an attraction to stop at, although my boys loved the idea that is was a tunnel and not a bridge over the water.
I can't really call this an attraction but it's a way to get from Alameda (which is an island) to Oakland. The Webster St. Tube goes in the other direction, from Oakland to... read more
Stay away during commute hours, and hope there is not an accident. The island is filling up, and the wait is getting longer.
